users.description: Any person visiting the creche website without logging in

userStories.story: As a visitor, I want to view information about the creche so that I can understand what services it offers.
As a visitor, I want to read the admission guidelines so that I know the requirements before applying.
As a visitor, I want to view the creche gallery so that I can see the environment and facilities.
As a visitor, I want to see the creche contact details so that I can get in touch easily.
As a visitor, I want to view public notices and announcements so that I stay informed about important updates.

users.description: A registered parent applying for a child’s admission

userStories.story: As a parent, I want to register and log in so that I can securely manage my child’s application.
As a parent, I want to add more than one child so that I can apply for multiple children under one account.
As a parent, I want to enter my child’s details so that the creche can assess eligibility.
As a parent, I want the system to validate my child’s age against the selected grade so that I do not submit incorrect information.
As a parent, I want to upload required documents so that my application is complete.
As a parent, I want to submit an application and receive a confirmation so that I know it was successful.
As a parent, I want to track my child’s admission status so that I know whether the application is pending, accepted, or rejected.
As a parent, I want to receive notifications or view notices so that I stay informed about creche updates.

users.description: Creche staff responsible for managing applications and content

userStories.story: As an admin, I want to log in securely so that I can manage the creche system.
As an admin, I want to view all submitted applications so that I can review child and parent details.
As an admin, I want to accept or reject an application so that I can control admissions.
As an admin, I want to update application statuses so that parents can see real-time results.
As an admin, I want to post notices and announcements so that parents receive important information.
As an admin, I want to manage static content such as admission guidelines and contact details so that the website information stays accurate.
